attributes.action: Stop the endorsement of Sharia law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sharia law should have no place in the United Kingdom. We have by all accounts one of the most admired legal systems in the world.
The adoption of Sharia law would create a dual standard in the country and would further alienate the muslim community.
We are one nation and should have one goverment and one law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
